verses.verse: Then wrought <WH6213> Bezaleel <WH1212> and Aholiab, <WH171> and every <WH3605> wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> man, <WH376> in whom <WH834> <WH1992> the LORD <WH3068> put <WH5414> wisdom <WH2451> and understanding <WH8394> to know <WH3045> how to work <WH6213> <WH853> all manner <WH3605> of work <WH4399> for the service <WH5656> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had commanded. <WH6680>

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH413> Bezaleel <WH1212> and Aholiab, <WH171> and every <WH3605> wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> man, <WH376> in whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> the LORD <WH3068> had put <WH5414> wisdom, <WH2451> even every one <WH3605> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> stirred him up <WH5375> to come <WH7126> unto <WH413> the work <WH4399> to do <WH6213> it:

And they received <WH3947> of <WH4480> <WH6440> Moses <WH4872> <WH853> all <WH3605> the offering, <WH8641> which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had brought <WH935> for the work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> to make <WH6213> it withal. And they <WH1992> brought <WH935> yet <WH5750> unto <WH413> him free offerings <WH5071> every morning. <WH1242> <WH1242>

And all <WH3605> the wise men, <WH2450> that wrought <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> the work <WH4399> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> came <WH935> every man <WH376> <WH376> from his work <WH4480> <WH4399> which <WH834> they <WH1992> made; <WH6213>

And they spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559> The people <WH5971> bring <WH935> much more <WH7235> than enough <WH4480> <WH1767> for the service <WH5656> of the work, <WH4399> which <WH834> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to make. <WH6213>

And Moses <WH4872> gave commandment, <WH6680> and they caused it to be proclaimed <WH5674> <WH6963> throughout the camp, <WH4264> saying, <WH559> Let neither <WH408> man <WH376> nor woman <WH802> make <WH6213> any more <WH5750> work <WH4399> for the offering <WH8641> of the sanctuary. <WH6944> So the people <WH5971> were restrained <WH3607> from bringing. <WH4480> <WH935>
For the stuff <WH4399> they had <WH1961> was sufficient <WH1767> for all <WH3605> the work <WH4399> to make <WH6213> it, and too much. <WH3498>

And every <WH3605> wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> man among them that wrought <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of <WH853> the tabernacle <WH4908> made <WH6213> ten <WH6235> curtains <WH3407> of fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> and blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet: <WH8438> <WH8144> with cherubims <WH3742> of cunning <WH2803> work <WH4639> made <WH6213> he them.

The length <WH753> of one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> was twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> four <WH702> cubits: <WH520> the curtains <WH3407> were all <WH3605> of one <WH259> size. <WH4060>

And he coupled <WH2266> <WH853> the five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> one <WH259> unto <WH413> another: <WH259> and the other five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> he coupled <WH2266> one <WH259> unto <WH413> another. <WH259>

And he made <WH6213> loops <WH3924> of blue <WH8504> on <WH5921> the edge <WH8193> of one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> from the selvage <WH4480> <WH7098> in the coupling: <WH4225> likewise <WH3651> he made <WH6213> in the uttermost <WH7020> side <WH8193> of another curtain, <WH3407> in the coupling <WH4225> of the second. <WH8145>

Fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> made <WH6213> he in one <WH259> curtain, <WH3407> and fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> made <WH6213> he in the edge <WH7097> of the curtain <WH3407> which <WH834> was in the coupling <WH4225> of the second: <WH8145> the loops <WH3924> held <WH6901> one <WH259> curtain to <WH413> another. <WH259>

And he made <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> taches <WH7165> of gold, <WH2091> and coupled <WH2266> <WH853> the curtains <WH3407> one <WH259> unto <WH413> another <WH259> with the taches: <WH7165> so it became <WH1961> one <WH259> tabernacle. <WH4908>
And he made <WH6213> curtains <WH3407> of goats' <WH5795> hair for the tent <WH168> over <WH5921> the tabernacle: <WH4908> eleven <WH6249> <WH6240> curtains <WH3407> he made <WH6213> them.

The length <WH753> of one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> was thirty <WH7970> cubits, <WH520> and four <WH702> cubits <WH520> was the breadth <WH7341> of one <WH259> curtain: <WH3407> the eleven <WH6249> <WH6240> curtains <WH3407> were of one <WH259> size. <WH4060>
And he coupled <WH2266> <WH853> five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> by themselves, <WH905> and six <WH8337> curtains <WH3407> by themselves. <WH905>

And he made <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> upon <WH5921> the uttermost <WH7020> edge <WH8193> of the curtain <WH3407> in the coupling, <WH4225> and fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> made <WH6213> he upon <WH5921> the edge <WH8193> of the curtain <WH3407> which coupleth <WH2279> the second. <WH8145>
And he made <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> taches <WH7165> of brass <WH5178> to couple the tent together, <WH2266> <WH853> <WH168> that it might be <WH1961> one. <WH259>

And he made <WH6213> a covering <WH4372> for the tent <WH168> of rams' <WH352> skins <WH5785> dyed red, <WH119> and a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785> above <WH4480> <WH4605> that.
And he made <WH6213> <WH853> boards <WH7175> for the tabernacle <WH4908> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> standing up. <WH5975>
The length <WH753> of a board <WH7175> was ten <WH6235> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of a <WH259> board <WH7175> one cubit <WH520> and a half. <WH2677>

One <WH259> board <WH7175> had two <WH8147> tenons, <WH3027> equally distant <WH7947> one <WH259> from <WH413> another: <WH259> thus <WH3651> did he make <WH6213> for all <WH3605> the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle. <WH4908>
And he made <WH6213> <WH853> boards <WH7175> for the tabernacle; <WH4908> twenty <WH6242> boards <WH7175> for the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward: <WH8486>

And forty <WH705> sockets <WH134> of silver <WH3701> he made <WH6213> under <WH8478> the twenty <WH6242> boards; <WH7175> two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under <WH8478> one <WH259> board <WH7175> for his two <WH8147> tenons, <WH3027> and two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under <WH8478> another <WH259> board <WH7175> for his two <WH8147> tenons. <WH3027>
And for the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> which is toward the north <WH6828> corner, <WH6285> he made <WH6213> twenty <WH6242> boards, <WH7175>

And their forty <WH705> sockets <WH134> of silver; <WH3701> two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under <WH8478> one <WH259> board, <WH7175> and two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under <WH8478> another <WH259> board. <WH7175>
And for the sides <WH3411> of the tabernacle <WH4908> westward <WH3220> he made <WH6213> six <WH8337> boards. <WH7175>
And two <WH8147> boards <WH7175> made <WH6213> he for the corners <WH4742> of the tabernacle <WH4908> in the two sides. <WH3411>

And they were <WH1961> coupled <WH8382> beneath, <WH4480> <WH4295> and coupled <WH1961> <WH8382> together <WH3162> at <WH413> the head <WH7218> thereof, to <WH413> one <WH259> ring: <WH2885> thus <WH3651> he did <WH6213> to both <WH8147> of them in both <WH8147> the corners. <WH4740>

And there were <WH1961> eight <WH8083> boards; <WH7175> and their sockets <WH134> were sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> sockets <WH134> of silver, <WH3701> under <WH8478> every <WH259> board <WH7175> two <WH8147> sockets. <WH134>
And he made <WH6213> bars <WH1280> of shittim <WH7848> wood; <WH6086> five <WH2568> for the boards <WH7175> of the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908>

And five <WH2568> bars <WH1280> for the boards <WH7175> of the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> and five <WH2568> bars <WH1280> for the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle <WH4908> for the sides <WH3411> westward. <WH3220>
And he made <WH6213> <WH853> the middle <WH8484> bar <WH1280> to shoot <WH1272> through <WH8432> the boards <WH7175> from <WH4480> the one end <WH7097> to <WH413> the other. <WH7097>

And he overlaid <WH6823> the boards <WH7175> with gold, <WH2091> and made <WH6213> their rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> to be places <WH1004> for the bars, <WH1280> and overlaid <WH6823> <WH853> the bars <WH1280> with gold. <WH2091>

And he made <WH6213> <WH853> a veil <WH6532> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen: <WH8336> <WH7806> with cherubims <WH3742> made <WH6213> he it of cunning <WH2803> work. <WH4639>

And he made <WH6213> thereunto four <WH702> pillars <WH5982> of shittim <WH7848> wood, and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold: <WH2091> their hooks <WH2053> were of gold; <WH2091> and he cast <WH3332> for them four <WH702> sockets <WH134> of silver. <WH3701>

And he made <WH6213> a hanging <WH4539> for the tabernacle <WH168> door <WH6607> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> of needlework; <WH4639> <WH7551>

And the five <WH2568> pillars <WH5982> of it with their hooks: <WH2053> and he overlaid <WH6823> their chapiters <WH7218> and their fillets <WH2838> with gold: <WH2091> but their five <WH2568> sockets <WH134> were of brass. <WH5178>
